%%sql

-- casework_case_info_dim

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW vw_casework_case_info_dim_temp

AS

SELECT DISTINCT
        IFNULL(AppealRefNumber, 'No Appeal Reference Number')           AS AppealRefNumber,
        IFNULL(CaseReference,'No Full Reference')                       AS CaseReference,
        IngestionDate                                                   AS IngestionDate
FROM    odw_harmonised_db.casework_case_info_dim WHERE IsActive = 'Y';

SELECT count(*) FROM vw_casework_case_info_dim_temp;

-- casework_all_appeals_dim

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW vw_casework_all_appeals_dim_temp

AS

SELECT DISTINCT
        IFNULL(AppealRefNumber, 'No Appeal Reference Number')   AS AppealRefNumber,
        'No Full Reference'                                     AS CaseReference,
        IngestionDate                                           AS IngestionDate
FROM    odw_harmonised_db.casework_all_appeals_dim WHERE IsActive = 'Y';

SELECT count(*) FROM vw_casework_all_appeals_dim_temp;

-- casework_common_land_dim

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW vw_casework_common_land_dim_temp

AS

SELECT DISTINCT
        IFNULL(AppealRefNumber, 'No Appeal Reference Number')   AS AppealRefNumber,
        'No Full Reference'                                     AS CaseReference,
        IngestionDate                                           AS IngestionDate
FROM    odw_harmonised_db.casework_common_land_dim WHERE IsActive = 'Y';

SELECT count(*) FROM vw_casework_common_land_dim_temp;

-- casework_hedgerow_dim

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW vw_casework_hedgerow_dim_temp

AS

SELECT DISTINCT
        IFNULL(AppealRefNumber, 'No Appeal Reference Number')           AS AppealRefNumber,
        IFNULL(CaseReference,'No Full Reference')                       AS CaseReference,
        IngestionDate                                                   AS IngestionDate
FROM    odw_harmonised_db.casework_hedgerow_dim WHERE IsActive = 'Y';

SELECT count(*) FROM vw_casework_hedgerow_dim_temp;

-- casework_high_hedges_dim

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW vw_casework_high_hedges_dim_temp

AS

SELECT DISTINCT
        IFNULL(AppealRefNumber, 'No Appeal Reference Number')           AS AppealRefNumber,
        IFNULL(CaseReference,'No Full Reference')                       AS CaseReference,
        IngestionDate                                                   AS IngestionDate
FROM    odw_harmonised_db.casework_high_hedges_dim WHERE IsActive = 'Y';

SELECT count(*) FROM vw_casework_high_hedges_dim_temp;

-- casework_legacy_rights_of_way_dim

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW vw_casework_legacy_rights_of_way_dim_temp

AS

SELECT DISTINCT
        'No Appeal Reference'                                           AS AppealRefNumber,
        FPSNumber                                                       AS CaseReference,
        IngestionDate                                                   AS IngestionDate
FROM    odw_harmonised_db.casework_legacy_rights_of_way_dim WHERE IsActive = 'Y';

SELECT count(*) FROM vw_casework_legacy_rights_of_way_dim_temp;

-- casework_nsip_data_dim

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW vw_casework_nsip_data_dim_temp

AS

SELECT DISTINCT
        'No Appeal Reference Number'                                    AS AppealRefNumber,
        IFNULL(CaseReference,'No Full Reference')                       AS CaseReference,
        IngestionDate                                                   AS IngestionDate
FROM    odw_harmonised_db.casework_nsip_data_dim WHERE IsActive = 'Y';

SELECT count(*) FROM vw_casework_nsip_data_dim_temp;

-- casework_picaso_dim

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW vw_casework_picaso_dim_temp

AS

SELECT DISTINCT
        IFNULL(AppealRefNumber, 'No Appeal Reference Number')           AS AppealRefNumber,
        'No Full Reference'                                             AS CaseReference,
        IngestionDate                                                   AS IngestionDate
FROM    odw_harmonised_db.casework_picaso_dim WHERE IsActive = 'Y';

SELECT count(*) FROM vw_casework_picaso_dim_temp;

-- casework_tpo_dim

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW vw_casework_tpo_dim_temp

AS

SELECT DISTINCT
        IFNULL(AppealReferenceNumber, 'No Appeal Reference Number')           AS AppealRefNumber,
        IFNULL(CaseReference,'No Full Reference')                       AS CaseReference,
        IngestionDate                                                   AS IngestionDate
FROM    odw_harmonised_db.casework_tpo_dim WHERE IsActive = 'Y';

SELECT count(*) FROM vw_casework_tpo_dim_temp;

%%sql
-- Build casework_case_fact table
-- Gets modified or deleted from source rows

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW casework_case_full_list (
        AppealRefNumber,
        CaseReference,
        IngestionDate
)

     AS

-- gets data that matches of SourceID and flags that it is modified based on a row (md5) hash. Flags as "NewData"
-- gets data that is in the target but not in source. Flags as "DeletedData"

SELECT DISTINCT
        AppealRefNumber,
        CaseReference,
        IngestionDate
FROM vw_casework_case_info_dim_temp

UNION ALL
       SELECT DISTINCT 
                AppealRefNumber,
                CaseReference,
                IngestionDate
        FROM vw_casework_all_appeals_dim_temp
UNION ALL
       SELECT DISTINCT 
                AppealRefNumber,
                CaseReference,
                IngestionDate
        FROM vw_casework_common_land_dim_temp
UNION ALL
       SELECT DISTINCT 
                AppealRefNumber,
                CaseReference,
                IngestionDate
        FROM vw_casework_hedgerow_dim_temp
UNION ALL
       SELECT DISTINCT 
                AppealRefNumber,
                CaseReference,
                IngestionDate
        FROM vw_casework_high_hedges_dim_temp
UNION ALL
       SELECT DISTINCT 
                AppealRefNumber,
                CaseReference,
                IngestionDate
        FROM vw_casework_legacy_rights_of_way_dim_temp
UNION ALL
       SELECT DISTINCT 
                AppealRefNumber,
                CaseReference,
                IngestionDate
        FROM vw_casework_nsip_data_dim_temp
UNION ALL
       SELECT DISTINCT 
                AppealRefNumber,
                CaseReference,
                IngestionDate
        FROM vw_casework_picaso_dim_temp
UNION ALL
       SELECT DISTINCT 
                AppealRefNumber,
                CaseReference,
                IngestionDate
        FROM vw_casework_tpo_dim_temp
;

SELECT count(*) FROM casework_case_full_list;

# Check for new, updated or deleted data
- This script checks for new, updated or deleted data by checking the source data (horizon tables) against the target (odw_harmonised_db.casework tables)
- **New Data:** where an main Reference in the source does not exist in the target, then NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Updated data:** Comparison occurs on Reference Fields in source and in target where the row hash is different i.e. there is a change in one of the columns. NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Deleted data:** where an Reference info in the target exists but the same identifyers don't exist in the source. DeletedData flag is set to 'Y'

## View casework_case_fact is created

%%sql
-- Build casework_case_fact table
-- Gets modified or deleted from source rows

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW casework_case_fact_new

     AS

-- gets data that matches of SourceID and flags that it is modified based on a row (md5) hash. Flags as "NewData"
-- gets data that is in the target but not in source. Flags as "DeletedData"

SELECT DISTINCT
    CASE
        WHEN T1.CaseReference IS NULL
        THEN T3.CaseID
        ELSE NULL
    END                                                    AS CaseID,
    T1.CaseReference,
    T4.AdditionalFieldsID,
    T5.EventID,
    T6.InspectorCasesID,
    T7.NSIPProjectInfoInternalID                           AS ProjectInfoInternalID,
    T40.CaseInfoID,
    T8.CaseDatesID,
    T9.CaseOfficerAdditionalDetailsID,
    T10.NSIPRedactionsID,
    T11.CommentsDimID                                      AS CommentsID,
    T12.DocumentsID,
    T14.ReadingCaseID,
    T13.CasemarkingID,
    T15.OutcomeReferenceID,
    T11.State,
    T11.Type,
    T16.AllAppealsID,
    T17.AllAppealsAdditionalDataID,
    T1.AppealRefNumber,
    T3.Appellant,
    T7.AddressLine1                                        AS SiteAddress1,
    T7.AddressLine2                                        AS SiteAddress2,
    T7.AddressTown                                         AS SiteTown,
    T7.AddressCounty                                       AS SiteCounty,
    T7.PostCode                                            AS SitePostCode,
    T18.SpecialistCoastalAccessID,
    T19.SpecialistEnvironmentID,
    T20.SpecialistHighCourtID,
    T21.SpecialistCaseStringID,
    T22.SpecialistCaseDatesID,
    T23.SpecialistRechargeID,
    T24.SpecialistPurchaseNoticeID,
    T25.CommonLandID,
    T26.SpecialistModificationsID,
    T27.ApplicationSubTypeCaseNameID,
    T28.DecisionIssueID                                     AS DecisionIssuesID,
    T29.AdvertDetailsID,
    T30.EnforcementGroundsID,
    T31.SpecialCircumstanceID,
    T32.SpecialismID,
    T33.NSIPExaminationTimetableID,
    T35.ContactInformationID,
    CASE
        WHEN T7.NSIPProjectInfoInternalID IS NULL OR 
            T10.NSIPRedactionsID IS NULL OR 
            T33.NSIPExaminationTimetableID IS NULL
        THEN 'N'
        ELSE 'Y'
    END                                                     AS IsNSIP, 
    CASE
        WHEN T37.CaseReference = T1.CaseReference OR 
            T38.CaseReference = T1.CaseReference OR 
            T39.CaseReference = T1.CaseReference
        THEN 'Y'
        ELSE 'N'
    END                                                     AS IsGreenAppeal,
    T2.SourceSystemID,
    to_timestamp(T1.IngestionDate)                          AS IngestionDate,
    NULL                                                    AS ValidTo,
    md5(concat(
        IFNULL(T1.CaseReference,'.'),
        IFNULL(T4.AdditionalFieldsID,'.'),
        IFNULL(T5.EventID,'.'),
        IFNULL(T6.InspectorCasesID,'.'),
        IFNULL(T7.NSIPProjectInfoInternalID,'.')
        ))                                                  AS RowID, -- this hash should contain all the defining fields, so needs to be done
    'Y'                                                     AS IsActive,
    T3.IsActive                                             AS HistoricIsActive

FROM casework_case_full_list T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact T2 
    ON "Casework" = T2.Description 
        AND T2.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.casework_case_info_dim T40 
    ON T1.CaseReference = T40.CaseReference
        AND T40.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.casework_case_fact T3 
    ON T1.CaseReference = T3.CaseReference
        AND T3.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.casework_additional_fields_dim T4 
    ON T1.CaseReference = T4.CaseReference
        AND T4.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.casework_event_dim T5 
    ON T1.CaseReference = T5.CaseReference 
        AND T5.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.casework_inspector_cases_dim T6 
    ON T1.CaseReference = T6.CaseReference 
        AND T6.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.casework_nsip_data_dim T7 
    ON T1.CaseReference = T7.CaseReference 
        AND T5.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.casework_case_dates_dim T8 
    ON T1.CaseReference = T8.CaseReference 
        AND T8.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.casework_case_officer_additional_details_dim T9 
    ON T1.CaseReference = T9.CaseReference 
        AND T9.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.casework_nsip_redactions_dim T10 
    ON T1.CaseReference = T10.CaseReference 
        AND T10.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.checkmark_comments_dim T11 
    ON T1.CaseReference = T11.CaseReference 
        AND T11.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.checkmark_documents_dim T12  
    ON T1.CaseReference = T12.CaseReference 
        AND T12.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.checkmark_casemarking_dim T13  
    ON T1.CaseReference = T13.CaseReference 
        AND T13.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.checkmark_reading_case_dim T14  
    ON T1.CaseReference = T14.CaseReference 
        AND T14.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.checkmark_casemarking_fact T15  
    ON T1.CaseReference = T15.CaseReference 
        AND T15.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.casework_all_appeals_dim T16  
    ON T1.AppealRefNumber = T16.AppealRefNumber 
        AND T16.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.casework_all_appeals_additional_data_dim T17  
    ON T1.AppealRefNumber = T17.AppealRefNumber 
        AND T17.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.casework_specialist_coastal_access_dim T18  
    ON T1.AppealRefNumber = T18.AppealRefNumber 
        AND T18.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.casework_specialist_environment_dim T19  
    ON T1.AppealRefNumber = T19.AppealRefNumber 
        AND T19.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.casework_specialist_high_court_dim T20  
    ON T1.AppealRefNumber = T20.AppealRefNumber 
        AND T20.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.casework_specialist_case_string_dim T21  
    ON T1.AppealRefNumber = T21.AppealRefNumber 
        AND T21.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.casework_specialist_case_dates_dim T22  
    ON T1.AppealRefNumber = T22.AppealRefNumber 
        AND T22.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.casework_specialist_recharge_dim T23  
    ON T1.AppealRefNumber = T23.AppealRefNumber 
        AND T23.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.casework_specialist_purchase_notice_dim T24  
    ON T1.AppealRefNumber = T24.AppealRefNumber 
        AND T24.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.casework_common_land_dim T25  
    ON T1.AppealRefNumber = T25.AppealRefNumber 
        AND T25.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.casework_specialist_modifications_dim T26  
    ON T1.AppealRefNumber = T26.AppealRefNumber 
        AND T26.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.casework_application_sub_type_case_name_dim T27  
    ON T1.AppealRefNumber = T27.AppealRefNumber 
        AND T27.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.casework_decision_issue_dim T28  
    ON T1.AppealRefNumber = T28.AppealRefNumber 
        AND T28.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.casework_advert_details_dim T29  
    ON T1.AppealRefNumber = T29.AppealRefNumber 
        AND T29.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.casework_enforcement_grounds_dim T30 
    ON T1.AppealRefNumber = T30.AppealRefNumber 
        AND T30.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.casework_special_circumstance_dim T31 
    ON T1.AppealRefNumber = T31.AppealRefNumber 
        AND T31.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.casework_specialism_dim T32 
    ON T1.AppealRefNumber = T32.AppealRefNumber 
        AND T32.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.casework_nsip_examination_timetable_dim T33 
    ON T1.CaseReference = T33.CaseReference 
        AND T33.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.casework_contact_information_dim T35 
    ON T1.CaseReference = T35.CaseNumber 
        AND T35.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.casework_hedgerow_dim T37 
    ON T1.CaseReference = T37.CaseReference 
    AND T37.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.casework_hedgerow_dim T38 
    ON T1.CaseReference = T38.CaseReference 
    AND T38.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.casework_tpo_dim T39
    ON T1.CaseReference = T39.CaseReference 
    AND T39.IsActive = 'Y'

WHERE
    (   CASE
            WHEN T1.CaseReference = T3.CaseReference AND md5(concat(IFNULL(T1.CaseReference,'.'),IFNULL(T4.AdditionalFieldsID,'.'),IFNULL(T5.EventID,'.'),IFNULL(T6.InspectorCasesID,'.'),IFNULL(T7.NSIPProjectInfoInternalID,'.'))) <> T3.RowID  -- same employee, changed data
            THEN 'Y'
            WHEN T3.CaseReference IS NULL -- new PositionCode
            THEN 'Y'
            ELSE 'N'
        END  = 'Y')
    AND T1.IngestionDate = (SELECT MAX(IngestionDate) FROM casework_case_full_list);

# Dataset is created that contains changed data and corresponding target data
- This script combines data that has been updated, Deleted or is new, with corresponding target data
- View **casework_all_appeals_new** is unioned to the target data filter to only those rows where changes have been detected
## View casework_case_fact_changed_rows is created

%%sql
-- Create new and updated dataset

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW casework_case_fact_changed_rows

AS

-- gets updated, deleted and new rows 
SELECT 
    CaseID,
    CaseReference,
    AdditionalFieldsID,
    EventID,
    InspectorCasesID,
    ProjectInfoInternalID,
    CaseInfoID,
    CaseDatesID,
    CaseOfficerAdditionalDetailsID,
    NSIPRedactionsID,
    CommentsID,
    DocumentsID,
    ReadingCaseID,
    CasemarkingID,
    OutcomeReferenceID,
    State,
    Type,
    AllAppealsID,
    AllAppealsAdditionalDataID,
    AppealRefNumber,
    Appellant,
    SiteAddress1,
    SiteAddress2,
    SiteTown,
    SiteCounty,
    SitePostCode,   
    SpecialistCoastalAccessID,
    SpecialistEnvironmentID,
    SpecialistHighCourtID,
    SpecialistCaseStringID,
    SpecialistCaseDatesID,
    SpecialistRechargeID,
    SpecialistPurchaseNoticeID,
    CommonLandID,
    SpecialistModificationsID,
    ApplicationSubTypeCaseNameID,
    DecisionIssuesID,
    AdvertDetailsID,
    EnforcementGroundsID,
    SpecialCircumstanceID,
    SpecialismID,
    NSIPExaminationTimetableID,
    ContactInformationID,
    IsNSIP,
    IsGreenAppeal,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive

FROM casework_case_fact_new WHERE HistoricIsActive = 'Y' OR HistoricIsActive IS NULL

UNION ALL

-- gets original versions of updated rows so we can update EndDate and set IsActive flag to 'N'
SELECT
    CaseID,
    CaseReference,
    AdditionalFieldsID,
    EventID,
    InspectorCasesID,
    ProjectInfoInternalID,
    CaseInfoID,
    CaseDatesID,
    CaseOfficerAdditionalDetailsID,
    NSIPRedactionsID,
    CommentsID,
    DocumentsID,
    ReadingCaseID,
    CasemarkingID,
    OutcomeReferenceID,
    State,
    Type,
    AllAppealsID,
    AllAppealsAdditionalDataID,
    AppealRefNumber,
    Appellant,
    SiteAddress1,
    SiteAddress2,
    SiteTown,
    SiteCounty,
    SitePostCode,   
    SpecialistCoastalAccessID,
    SpecialistEnvironmentID,
    SpecialistHighCourtID,
    SpecialistCaseStringID,
    SpecialistCaseDatesID,
    SpecialistRechargeID,
    SpecialistPurchaseNoticeID,
    CommonLandID,
    SpecialistModificationsID,
    ApplicationSubTypeCaseNameID,
    DecisionIssuesID,
    AdvertDetailsID,
    EnforcementGroundsID,
    SpecialCircumstanceID,
    SpecialismID,
    NSIPExaminationTimetableID,
    ContactInformationID,
    IsNSIP,
    IsGreenAppeal,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
    
FROM odw_harmonised_db.casework_case_fact
WHERE CaseReference IN (SELECT CaseReference FROM casework_case_fact_new WHERE CaseID IS NULL) AND IsActive = 'Y';

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW Loading_month

AS

SELECT DISTINCT
    IngestionDate AS IngestionDate,
    to_timestamp(date_sub(IngestionDate,1)) AS ClosingDate,
    'Y' AS IsActive

FROM casework_case_fact_new;

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW casework_case_fact_changed_rows_final

AS

SELECT 
    CaseID,
    CaseReference,
    AdditionalFieldsID,
    EventID,
    InspectorCasesID,
    ProjectInfoInternalID,
    CaseInfoID,
    CaseDatesID,
    CaseOfficerAdditionalDetailsID,
    NSIPRedactionsID,
    CommentsID,
    DocumentsID,
    ReadingCaseID,
    CasemarkingID,
    OutcomeReferenceID,
    State,
    Type,
    AllAppealsID,
    AllAppealsAdditionalDataID,
    AppealRefNumber,
    Appellant,
    SiteAddress1,
    SiteAddress2,
    SiteTown,
    SiteCounty,
    SitePostCode,   
    SpecialistCoastalAccessID,
    SpecialistEnvironmentID,
    SpecialistHighCourtID,
    SpecialistCaseStringID,
    SpecialistCaseDatesID,
    SpecialistRechargeID,
    SpecialistPurchaseNoticeID,
    CommonLandID,
    SpecialistModificationsID,
    ApplicationSubTypeCaseNameID,
    DecisionIssuesID,
    AdvertDetailsID,
    EnforcementGroundsID,
    SpecialCircumstanceID,
    SpecialismID,
    NSIPExaminationTimetableID,
    ContactInformationID,
    IsNSIP,
    IsGreenAppeal,
    T1.SourceSystemID,
    T1.IngestionDate,
    T1.ValidTo,
    T1.RowID,
    T1.IsActive,
    T2.ClosingDate
FROM casework_case_fact_changed_rows T1
FULL JOIN Loading_month T2 ON T1.IsActive = T2.IsActive

# View casework_case_fact_changed_rows is used in a merge (Upsert) statement into the target table
- **WHEN MATCHED** ON the surrogate Key (i.e. AllAppealsID), EndDate is set to today -1 day and the IsActive flag is set to 'N'
- **WHEN NOT MATCHED** ON the surrogate Key, insert rows
## Table odw_harmonised_db.casework_case_fact is updated

%%sql
-- merge into dim table

MERGE INTO odw_harmonised_db.casework_case_fact AS Target
USING casework_case_fact_changed_rows_final AS Source

ON Source.CaseID = Target.CaseID

-- For Updates existing rows

WHEN MATCHED
    THEN 
    UPDATE SET
    Target.ValidTo = to_timestamp(ClosingDate),
    Target.IsActive = 'N'

-- Insert completely new rows

WHEN NOT MATCHED 
    THEN INSERT (
        CaseID,
        CaseReference,
        AdditionalFieldsID,
        EventID,
        InspectorCasesID,
        ProjectInfoInternalID,
        CaseInfoID,
        CaseDatesID,
        CaseOfficerAdditionalDetailsID,
        NSIPRedactionsID,
        CommentsID,
        DocumentsID,
        ReadingCaseID,
        CasemarkingID,
        OutcomeReferenceID,
        State,
        Type,
        AllAppealsID,
        AllAppealsAdditionalDataID,
        AppealRefNumber,
        Appellant,
        SiteAddress1,
        SiteAddress2,
        SiteTown,
        SiteCounty,
        SitePostCode,   
        SpecialistCoastalAccessID,
        SpecialistEnvironmentID,
        SpecialistHighCourtID,
        SpecialistCaseStringID,
        SpecialistCaseDatesID,
        SpecialistRechargeID,
        SpecialistPurchaseNoticeID,
        CommonLandID,
        SpecialistModificationsID,
        ApplicationSubTypeCaseNameID,
        DecisionIssuesID,
        AdvertDetailsID,
        EnforcementGroundsID,
        SpecialCircumstanceID,
        SpecialismID,
        NSIPExaminationTimetableID,
        ContactInformationID,
        IsNSIP,
        IsGreenAppeal,
        SourceSystemID,
        IngestionDate,
        ValidTo,
        RowID,
        IsActive)
    VALUES (
        Source.CaseID,
        Source.CaseReference,
        Source.AdditionalFieldsID,
        Source.EventID,
        Source.InspectorCasesID,
        Source.ProjectInfoInternalID,
        Source.CaseInfoID,
        Source.CaseDatesID,
        Source.CaseOfficerAdditionalDetailsID,
        Source.NSIPRedactionsID,
        Source.CommentsID,
        Source.DocumentsID,
        Source.ReadingCaseID,
        Source.CasemarkingID,
        Source.OutcomeReferenceID,
        Source.State,
        Source.Type,
        Source.AllAppealsID,
        Source.AllAppealsAdditionalDataID,
        Source.AppealRefNumber,
        Source.Appellant,
        Source.SiteAddress1,
        Source.SiteAddress2,
        Source.SiteTown,
        Source.SiteCounty,
        Source.SitePostCode,   
        Source.SpecialistCoastalAccessID,
        Source.SpecialistEnvironmentID,
        Source.SpecialistHighCourtID,
        Source.SpecialistCaseStringID,
        Source.SpecialistCaseDatesID,
        Source.SpecialistRechargeID,
        Source.SpecialistPurchaseNoticeID,
        Source.CommonLandID,
        Source.SpecialistModificationsID,
        Source.ApplicationSubTypeCaseNameID,
        Source.DecisionIssuesID,
        Source.AdvertDetailsID,
        Source.EnforcementGroundsID,
        Source.SpecialCircumstanceID,
        Source.SpecialismID,
        Source.NSIPExaminationTimetableID,
        Source.ContactInformationID,
        Source.IsNSIP,
        Source.IsGreenAppeal,
        Source.SourceSystemID,
        Source.IngestionDate,
        Source.ValidTo,
        Source.RowID,
        Source.IsActive)

# Fix the IDs
- No auto-increment feature is available in delta tables, therefore we need to create new IDs for the inserted rows
- This is done by select the target data and using INSERT OVERWRITE to re-insert the data is a new Row Number
## Table odw_harmonised_db.casework_case_fact is updated

%%sql
-- Insert new casework_case_fact

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.casework_case_fact

SELECT 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY CaseID NULLS LAST) AS CaseID,
    CaseReference,
    AdditionalFieldsID,
    EventID,
    InspectorCasesID,
